trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: Get-FileHash
trans-unit.target: Get-filehash

trans-unit.source: Get-FileHash
trans-unit.target: Get-filehash

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 概要

trans-unit.source: Computes the hash value for a file by using a specified hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的雜湊演算法來計算檔案的雜湊值。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 語法

trans-unit.source: Path (Default)
trans-unit.target: 路徑 （預設值）

trans-unit.source: LiteralPath
trans-unit.target: 常值路徑

trans-unit.source: Stream
trans-unit.target: 資料流

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The **Get-FileHash** cmdlet computes the hash value for a file by using a specified hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: **Get-filehash** 指令程式是使用指定的雜湊演算法來計算檔案的雜湊值。

trans-unit.source: A hash value is a unique value that corresponds to the content of the file.
trans-unit.target: 雜湊值是對應至檔案內容的唯一值。

trans-unit.source: Rather than identifying the contents of a file by its file name, extension, or other designation, a hash assigns a unique value to the contents of a file.
trans-unit.target: 雜湊會指派唯一值至檔案內容，而非依檔案名稱、副檔名或其他指定項目來識別檔案的內容。

trans-unit.source: File names and extensions can be changed without altering the content of the file, and without changing the hash value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在不修改檔案內容的情況下變更檔案名稱與副檔名，這樣不會變更雜湊值。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the file's content can be changed without changing the name or extension.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，可以變更檔案的內容，而不需要變更名稱或副檔名。

trans-unit.source: However, changing even a single character in the contents of a file changes the hash value of the file.
trans-unit.target: 不過，即使只變更檔案內容中的一個字元，也會造成檔案的雜湊值變更。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of hash values is to provide a cryptographically-secure way to verify that the contents of a file have not been changed.
trans-unit.target: 雜湊值的目的是提供以密碼編譯的安全方式來確認檔案內容未經變更。

trans-unit.source: While some hash algorithms, including MD5 and SHA1, are no longer considered secure against attack, the goal of a secure hash algorithm is to render it impossible to change the contents of a file-either by accident, or by malicious or unauthorized attempt-and maintain the same hash value.
trans-unit.target: 雖然某些雜湊演算法包括 MD5 和 SHA1，不再被視為安全地抵禦攻擊，安全雜湊演算法的目標是將其轉譯不可能不小心或惡意或未經授權嘗試變更的檔案-可能是內容-和維護相同的雜湊值。

trans-unit.source: You can also use hash values to determine if two different files have exactly the same content.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用雜湊值來判斷兩個檔案是否具有完全相同的內容。

trans-unit.source: If the hash values of two files are identical, the contents of the files are also identical.
trans-unit.target: 若兩個檔案的雜湊值完全相同，則檔案的內容也完全相同。

trans-unit.source: By default, the **Get-FileHash** cmdlet uses the SHA256 algorithm, although any hash algorithm that is supported by the target operating system can be used.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設， **Get-filehash** 指令程式會使用 SHA256 演算法，不過您也可以使用任何雜湊演算法所支援的目標作業系統。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Compute the hash value for a PowerShell.exe file
trans-unit.target: 範例 1︰ 計算 PowerShell.exe 檔案的雜湊值

trans-unit.source: This command uses the **Get-FileHash** cmdlet to compute the hash value for the Powershell.exe file.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會使用 **Get-filehash** 指令程式可計算的 Powershell.exe 檔案的雜湊值。

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm used is the default, SHA256.
trans-unit.target: 使用的雜湊演算法是預設的 SHA256。

trans-unit.source: The output is piped to the Format-List cmdlet to format the output as a list.
trans-unit.target: 輸出會被輸送到 Format-list cmdlet 將輸出格式化為清單。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Compute the has value for an ISO file
trans-unit.target: 範例 2︰ 計算值的 ISO 檔案

trans-unit.source: This command uses the **Get-FileHash** cmdlet and the SHA384 algorithm to compute the hash value for an ISO file that an administrator has downloaded from the Internet.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會使用 **Get-filehash** cmdlet 與 SHA384 演算法來計算雜湊值之系統管理員已從網際網路下載的 ISO 檔案。

trans-unit.source: The output is piped to the Format-List cmdlet to format the output as a list.
trans-unit.target: 輸出會被輸送到 Format-list cmdlet 將輸出格式化為清單。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 參數

trans-unit.source: -Algorithm
trans-unit.target: -演算法

trans-unit.source: Specifies the cryptographic hash function to use for computing the hash value of the contents of the specified file.
trans-unit.target: 指定要用於計算所指定檔案之內容雜湊值的密碼編譯雜湊函式。

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic hash function includes the property that it is not possible to find two distinct inputs that generate the same hash values.
trans-unit.target: 密碼編譯雜湊函式包含不可能用來尋找會產生相同雜湊值之兩個不同輸入的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Hash functions are commonly used with digital signatures and for data integrity.
trans-unit.target: 雜湊函式經常被用於數位簽章與資料完整性用途。

trans-unit.source: The acceptable values for this parameter are:
trans-unit.target: 此參數接受的值包括：

trans-unit.source: SHA1
trans-unit.target: SHA1

trans-unit.source: SHA256
trans-unit.target: SHA256

trans-unit.source: SHA384
trans-unit.target: SHA384

trans-unit.source: SHA512
trans-unit.target: SHA512

trans-unit.source: MACTripleDES
trans-unit.target: MACTripleDES

trans-unit.source: MD5
trans-unit.target: MD5

trans-unit.source: RIPEMD160
trans-unit.target: RIPEMD160

trans-unit.source: If no value is specified, or if the parameter is omitted, the default value is SHA256.
trans-unit.target: 若未指定值，或省略參數，則預設值是 SHA256。

trans-unit.source: For security reasons, MD5 and SHA1, which are no longer considered secure, should only be used for simple change validation, and should not be used to generate hash values for files that require protection from attack or tampering.
trans-unit.target: 基於安全性理由，MD5 與 SHA1 (不再被視為安全) 只應該用於簡單的變更驗證，而不應該用於為需要保護以避免受攻擊或遭竄改的檔案產生雜湊值。

trans-unit.source: -InputStream
trans-unit.target: -InputStream

trans-unit.source: Specifies the input stream.
trans-unit.target: 指定輸入資料流。

trans-unit.source: -LiteralPath
trans-unit.target: -LiteralPath

trans-unit.source: Specifies the path to a file as an array.
trans-unit.target: 指定檔案的路徑做為陣列。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the *Path* parameter, the value of the *LiteralPath* parameter is used exactly as it is typed.
trans-unit.target: 不同於 *路徑* 參數、 值 *LiteralPath* 完全依照其輸入，使用參數。

trans-unit.source: No characters are interpreted as wildcard characters.
trans-unit.target: 沒有字元會被視為萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: If the path includes escape characters, enclose the path in single quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 如果路徑包含逸出字元，請將路徑括在單引號中。

trans-unit.source: Single quotation marks instruct Windows PowerShell not to interpret characters as escape sequences.
trans-unit.target: 單引號指示 Windows PowerShell 不要將字元視為逸出序列。

trans-unit.source: -Path
trans-unit.target: -Path

trans-unit.source: Specifies the path to one or more files as an array.
trans-unit.target: 指定一或多個檔案的路徑做為陣列。

trans-unit.source: Wildcard characters are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 支援一般參數:-偵錯、-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 以及-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸入

trans-unit.source: System.String
trans-unit.target: System.String

trans-unit.source: You can pipe a string to the **Get-FileHash** cmdlet that contains a path to one or more files.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用管線將字串 **Get-filehash** 指令程式，其中包含一或多個檔案的路徑。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸出

trans-unit.source: Microsoft.Powershell.Utility.FileHash
trans-unit.target: Microsoft.Powershell.Utility.FileHash

trans-unit.source: **Get-FileHash** returns an object that represents the path to the specified file, the value of the computed hash, and the algorithm used to compute the hash.
trans-unit.target: **Get-filehash** 傳回物件，表示指定的檔案、 計算雜湊，以及用來計算雜湊演算法的值的路徑。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 附註

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相關的連結

trans-unit.source: Format-List
trans-unit.target: Format-List
